HomePage.description: မြန်မာနိုင်ငံတွင် ငလျင်ဒဏ်ခံနိုင်စွမ်းနှင့် အဆောက်အဦးခိုင်ခံ့မှု တိုးမြှင့်ရေးအတွက် community အခြေပြု ပူးပေါင်းဆောင်ရွက်မှု
HomePage.who_we_are: We are a professional network dedicated to advancing earthquake resilience across Myanmar.
HomePage.Building a Safer Future description: Through innovative engineering solutions, MEEC strives to protect lives and create a more resilient Myanmar for generations to come.
HomePage.Advancing Earthquake Resilience descript: MEEC is dedicated to enhancing Myanmar’s resilience by promoting seismic safety and supporting disaster risk reduction initiatives.
HomePage.Empowering Communities description: We provide accessible technical knowledge and training to professionals and local communities, fostering a culture of preparedness.
HomePage.Read more news on our blog: Read more news on our blog
HomePage.Publications description: This core collection covers all technical areas of civil engineering. MEEC’s publications include books, peer-reviewed journals, conference proceedings, and magazines.
HomePage.Youtube description: Stay connected and get the latest news and insights from MEEC’s youtube channel

BlogDetailPage.Subscribe to our Youtube: Subscribe to our Youtube channel and stay up to date on the latest research news
